meanings.definition: The action or manner of managing or carrying out a process or activity.
meanings.sent1: Her conductances in organizing the event were impressive.
meanings.sent2: The conductances of the team during the project were efficient.
meanings.sent3: His conductances in juggling tasks made him the office superhero.
meanings.sent4: The conductances of the conductor led the orchestra to a harmonious performance.
meanings.sent5: The conductances of the chef in the kitchen were like a well-choreographed dance.

meanings.definition: The ability or power to transmit electricity or heat.
meanings.sent1: The conductances of the wires determined the efficiency of the circuit.
meanings.sent2: High-quality materials have excellent conductances of electricity.
meanings.sent3: The conductances of the toaster were so good, it toasted bread in seconds.
meanings.sent4: The conductances of the metal rod were compared to a fast-flowing river.
meanings.sent5: Understanding the conductances of different materials is crucial in electrical engineering.
